The beautifully tiled shower had luxurious soaps, etc. and the water pressure in the shower and sink were excellent. Todd & Tyler were very easy to communicate with and provided every detail necessary to find the loft, as well as how to check-in seamlessly. My husband and I have friends in the area and plan to visit again in the future. We would definitely book another stay.

The downtown area is now bustling with shops and restaurants and it was just the little weekend gateway we needed! Todd & Tyler reached out SO quickly with confirmation and details on the stay (and I booked the morning of)! The loft has high ceilings and exposed brick throughout, with a full kitchen, bath and large bedroom. My favorite part was the walk out balcony, perfect for morning coffee. The walkability was something I also really loved. We never moved the car once we got there. We walked down to Flywheel Brewing Saturday afternoon, then walked to JR Neighbors that night and to Bourbon Barrel Tavern for a drink after. The loft also sits on top of Vibe Coffee, a great local coffee shop that also has food. If you're looking to visit Etown for even just one night, I can't imagine a better place to stay! We're already planning our next visit!

Perfect stay at Todd & Tyler's historic loft with modern updates. The location is ideal, right off the central circle in Elizabethtown's quaint downtown area where there are numerous restaurants, bars, and shops to enjoy (we particularly loved J.R. Neighbors). The loft sits above a wonderful coffee shop, which makes for a little bit of noise starting in the morning but nothing bothersome by any means -- we kind of liked the dull hum of activity coming from below. Parking was easy, check-in and check-out were made very simple, and the communication from Todd & Tyler was perfect (thorough without being overwhelming). The loft, itself, is beautiful, open, and well-stocked with all the primary amenities you could need. Great living area and kitchen, comfortable bed, modern bathroom -- checked every box we were hoping for and matched exactly the description in the listing, and did so in style.
If you're visiting the Bourbon Trail, in town for a soccer tournament, or just passing through the area, I would highly recommend Todd & Tyler's loft over nearby hotels or other available accommodations. We will absolutely look to stay there again next time we're in Elizabethtown.
